info.title: OpenGraph API
info.description: AI/ML model and dataset Web3 blockchain infrastructure server

post.description:
zkLogin 초기화

1. Ephemeral public key를 받아서 nonce 생성
2. Google OAuth URL 생성 및 반환

get.description:
Google OAuth 콜백 처리

1. Authorization code를 access token으로 교환
2. Google 사용자 정보 조회
3. 사용자 생성 또는 업데이트
4. JWT 토큰 생성 및 클라이언트로 리다이렉트

post.description:
ZK proof를 생성하고 Sui 주소를 도출합니다.

1. JWT 토큰 검증
2. 사용자 salt 조회
3. ZK proof 생성
4. Sui 주소 도출
5. 사용자 계정에 Sui 주소 연결

get.description: 현재 로그인한 사용자 정보 조회

post.description:
클라이언트에서 생성한 Sui 주소를 사용자 계정에 업데이트합니다.

Args:
    request: Sui 주소 업데이트 요청
    current_user: 현재 인증된 사용자
    db: 데이터베이스 세션
    
Returns:
    UpdateSuiAddressResponse: 업데이트 결과

get.description: List all users with optional pagination and email filter.

schema.title: Response Get Users Api V1 Users  Get

get.description: Get the current user's information.
Get the current user's profile information.
Get a specific user by ID.

put.description:
Update a specific user by ID.
Note: This endpoint requires admin privileges.

delete.description:
Delete a specific user by ID.
Note: This endpoint requires admin privileges.

get.description: Get a specific user's profile by ID.
Search for a user by email address.
Search for a user by Sui wallet address.
List all datasets with optional search and sorting.
Get a dataset by id.

delete.description: Delete a dataset by its ID.

get.description: Get all images in a dataset.

post.description: Add a new image to specific dataset.

get.description: List all images with optional filtering, searching and sorting.

parameters.name: sort_by

schema.description: Sort by field (created_at, file_name, width, height)
schema.title: Sort By

parameters.description: Sort by field (created_at, file_name, width, height)

get.description: Get specific image by ID.

put.description:
Update image information.

Args:
    image_id: ID of the image to update
    image_data: Updated image data
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    ImageRead: Updated image information

delete.description:
Delete an image.

Args:
    image_id: ID of the image to delete
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    dict: Success message

get.description: Get a dictionary by ID
List all categories.
Get a specific category.
List all categories related to a dictionary.

post.description:
Create multiple dictionary-category associations for one dictionary.
All operations succeed or all fail (atomic transaction).

schema.title: Response Create Dictionary Categories Batch Api V1 Dictionary Categories Batch Post

get.description: List all annotations with optional filtering and sorting.

parameters.name: status

schema.description: Filter by exact status (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED)
schema.title: Status

parameters.description: Filter by exact status (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED)

parameters.name: source_type

schema.description: Filter by exact source type (AUTO, USER)
schema.title: Source Type

parameters.description: Filter by exact source type (AUTO, USER)

get.description: List all approved annotations.
Get a annotation by id

put.description:
Update an existing annotation.

Args:
    annotation_id: ID of the annotation to update
    annotation_data: Updated annotation data
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    AnnotationRead: Updated annotation

delete.description:
Delete an annotation.

Args:
    annotation_id: ID of the annotation to delete
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    dict: Success message

get.description: Get all annotations for a specific image with client-friendly format (polygon data, no RLE)

schema.title: Response Get Annotations By Image Api V1 Annotations Image  Image Id  Get

get.description: Get all annotations for a specific image with client-friendly format (polygon data, no RLE)

schema.title: Response Get Approved Annotations By Image Api V1 Annotations Image  Image Id  Approved Get

post.description:
Create a new annotation selection

Records user selections that combine multiple AUTO annotations to form a meaningful entity.
If the same selection is made by five or more users, it is automatically marked as APPROVED.

get.description: List annotation selections for specific user

schema.title: Response Get My Annotation Selections Api V1 Annotations Selections Me Get

get.description: Get a annotation selection by id

put.description:
Update a annotation selection

Mainly used for category update or status change by administrator

delete.description: Delete a annotation selection (only available for that annotator)

get.description:
Get annotation selection stats for a specific image

Provides information such as the number of users who made the same selection and whether it qualifies for approval.

schema.title: Response Get Image Selection Stats Api V1 Annotations Selections Image  Image Id  Stats Get
